short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: What if all websites looked like ransom notes?  I went to a hackday and the theme was silly interfaces so I decided to find out.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: THis extension takes all the text in any web page and breaks it up into fragments that can then by styled as if assembled through poorly cut-out magazine parts.  If you'd like every web page you visit to feel like you're in a 20th century B-movie, this is the extension for you!
